text: I thought this account was supposed to be anti-Sexist. . . But apparently only when the sexism is towards men . Wow .
Why does it have to be a male?
@elenalinkapasta in the future we may accept other admins that aren’t male, I’m just doing it one at a time for now.

@leanneyhunter Oh absolutely! I'm always willing to open my mind and I honestly take in what you mean as it has given me a bit more of an informative approach and idk why I brought up pro life 😂 you caught me on that one, I'm just here to kind of see an insight to which you kindly told me instead of attacking me like what a lot of the liberal side would do which I appreciate:) but I do think maybe think in general that the fluent activists shouldn't necessarily be men, it's about equality right? Let women speak up FOR the men too  if you kinda get what I mean

@elenalinkapasta lol I’ve had some mean things said from feminists too, I don’t get it, but continue to stand for what you believe in because that is what matters.
I understand your view and I’m real happy to hear of other women standing up for men’s rights too because there aren’t that many of us. I normally find myself to be the odd one out, as I’m sure you do too at times.

I genuinely don’t think anybody is trying to drive away our support though, I just think men are better placed for running men’s pages and us women can still support without being in control. 
To put it in context, I’d expect women to be running a women’s group account but would welcome everyone to support it, if that makes sense, I don’t think there is any malice there or anything.

Pro life and pro women are separate things to me, I know that’s an entirely different argument but the child is 50% father and 50% mother so it’s not really the same thing in that respect. Although that’s not a topic for here and now, I just feel the comparison isn’t the same.
Anyway I respect you for standing up for men, keep fighting the good fight 💕

@leanneyhunter my main point that I think though, is why segregate it? Why would you only want to limit to make supporters it's quite narrow minded and like shooting yourself in the foot- you want as much support as you can for these things and if a feminist said female only, it's labled as extremist and misandry (although according one feminist I spoke to misandry doesn't exist to that bitch lol)

@leanneyhunter yeah I did think that, and absolutely but idk about the account holder of this but you normally see male activists who are pro life and you could argue well they're not female so why should they have an opinion
@elenalinkapasta I’m pro Male too but it’s a men’s account, I can see the need for a male admin. We can support by comments and likes etc but we aren’t men so we will never know how men feel.
Why do you have to be male? I consider myself a pro male supporter..
